TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigXsltTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: Represents the XSLT transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.

span.span: Represents the XSLT transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il classe consente di inviare un documento XML utilizzando una trasformazione XSLT.The class allows you to address an XML document using an XSLT transformation. Questa classe Usa XSLT per trasformare i nodi XML in altri nodi XML che si desidera firmare o crittografare.This class uses XSLT to transform XML nodes into other XML nodes that you want to sign or encrypt. Utilizzare la classe per firmare o crittografare parti specifiche di un documento XML utilizzando una trasformazione XSLT.Use the class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XSLT transformation. L'Uniform Resource identificatore URI () che descrive il classe viene definita la campo.The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the class is defined by the field. Per ulteriori informazioni sulla trasformazione XSLT, vedere la sezione 6.6.5 della specifica XMLDSIG, disponibile dal W3C in www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.For more information about the XSLT transform, see Section 6.6.5 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples In questa sezione contiene due esempi di codice.This section contains two code examples. Il primo esempio di codice viene illustrato come accedere e verificare un documento XML usando il classe con una firma di busta.The first code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the class with an envelope signature. Il secondo esempio di codice viene illustrato come usare i membri del classe.The second code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. **Esempio 1 #****Example #1** [!code-cpp[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXsltTransform/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXsltTransform/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXsltTransform/VB/sample.vb#1)] **Esempio 2 #****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform/CPP/members.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform/CS/members.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform/VB/members.vb#2)]
